languages.text: {n}Высокий мужчина перед вами, кажется, целиком сплетен из жил, сухожилий и мускулов. Белая, почти сизая кожа просвечивает венами, скальп и подбородок покрывают коротко стриженные белые волосы. Многочисленные провода обвивают его шею и плечи, намекая на наличие нейронных разъемов под униформой. В лицо офицера, кажется, впечаталась гримаса раздражения и гнева, однако при виде вас он почтительно склоняет голову.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Главный кормчий Равор, к вашим услугам".

{n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. Blue veins snake under his white, almost dove-coloured skin, and his scalp and chin are covered in cropped white hair. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under his uniform. The officer's face seems to be twisted in a perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he greets you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Master Helmsman Ravor, at your service."
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий мужчина перед вами, кажется, целиком сплетен из жил, сухожилий и мускулов. Белая, почти сизая кожа просвечивает венами, скальп и подбородок покрывают коротко стриженные белые волосы. Многочисленные провода обвивают его шею и плечи, намекая на наличие нейронных разъемов под униформой. В лицо офицера, кажется, впечаталась гримаса раздражения и гнева, однако при виде вас он почтительно склоняет голову.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Главный кормчий Равор, к вашим услугам".

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. Blue veins are snaking under his white, almost dove-coloured skin, and his scalp and chin are covered in cropped fair hair. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under the uniform. The officer's face seems to be scrunched in perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he welcomes you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Chief Helmsman Ravor is at your service."

languages.text: {n}你面前这个身材魁梧的男人浑身上下都是腱子肉，蓝色的血管在几乎算得上是奶白色的皮肤下面蜿蜒着。他的头发和胡须都是白色的，剪得很利落。脖子和肩膀上缠绕着电线，制服下面似乎连接着神经连接器。这位军官的脸似乎从始至终都由于愤怒而扭在一起，但他还是恭敬地向你点头致意。{/n}“船长老大！舵手长雷沃为你效劳。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. Blue veins snake under his white, almost dove-coloured skin, and his scalp and chin are covered in cropped white hair. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under his uniform. The officer's face seems to be twisted in a perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he greets you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Master Helmsman Ravor, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前这个身材魁梧的男人浑身上下都是腱子肉，蓝色的血管在几乎算得上是奶白色的皮肤下面蜿蜒着。他的头发和胡须都是白色的，剪得很利落。脖子和肩膀上缠绕着电线，制服下面似乎连接着神经连接器。这位军官的脸似乎从始至终都由于愤怒而扭在一起，但他还是恭敬地向你点头致意。{/n}“船长老大！舵手长雷沃为你效劳。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre alto que tienes delante parece estar hecho de tendones y músculo. Por su piel, blanca como una paloma, serpentean venas azuladas. Su cabeza y su barbilla están cubiertas de pelo cano. Su cuello y hombros están envueltos en cables que delatan la existencia de conectores neurales bajo su uniforme. Su cara parece ser una mueca permanente de irritación y furia, pero te saluda con un respetuoso asentimiento.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! Maestro timonel Ravor, a su servicio».
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. Blue veins snake under his white, almost dove-coloured skin, and his scalp and chin are covered in cropped white hair. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under his uniform. The officer's face seems to be twisted in a perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he greets you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Master Helmsman Ravor, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre alto que tienes delante parece estar hecho de tendones y músculo. Por su piel, blanca como una paloma, serpentean venas azuladas. Su cabeza y su barbilla están cubiertas de pelo de color claro. Su cuello y hombros están envueltos en cables que delatan la existencia de conectores neurales bajo su uniforme. Su cara parece ser una mueca permanente de irritación y furia, pero te saluda con un respetuoso asentimiento.{/n} «¡L{mf|ord|ady} Capi! Maestro timonel Ravor, a su servicio».

languages.text: {n}腱と筋肉で編まれたような長身の男が目の前にいた。白い鳩のような白い肌の下に青い血管が蛇行し、頭皮と顎は刈り上げられた白い髪で覆われている。首と肩にはワイヤーが巻かれ、制服の下に神経コネクターがあることを示唆している。その士官の顔は、苛立ちと怒りで常に険しい表情に歪んでいるように見えるが、敬意を持って頷きながら挨拶をよこした。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！操舵手長のラヴォアです、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします」
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. Blue veins snake under his white, almost dove-coloured skin, and his scalp and chin are covered in cropped white hair. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under his uniform. The officer's face seems to be twisted in a perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he greets you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Master Helmsman Ravor, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}腱と筋肉で編まれたような長身の男が目の前にいた。白い鳩のような白い肌の下に青い血管が蛇行し、頭皮と顎は刈り上げられた白い髪で覆われている。首と肩にはワイヤーが巻かれ、制服の下に神経コネクターがあることを示唆している。その士官の顔は、苛立ちと怒りで常に険しい表情に歪んでいるように見えるが、敬意を持って頷きながら挨拶をよこした。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！操舵手長のラヴォアです、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします」

languages.text: {n}Der große Mann vor dir scheint nur aus Sehnen und Muskeln zu bestehen. Blaue Venen winden sich unter seiner weißen, beinahe taubengrauen Haut. Die weißen Haare an Kopf und Kinn sind militärisch gestutzt. Die Kabel an Hals und Schultern lassen vermuten, dass sich unter seiner Uniform Neuralkonnektoren verbergen. Obwohl das Gesicht des Offiziers einer Grimasse aus Unmut und Zorn gleicht, grüßt er dich mit einem respektvollen Nicken.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Hauptsteuermann Ravor, stets zu Diensten."
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. Blue veins snake under his white, almost dove-coloured skin, and his scalp and chin are covered in cropped white hair. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under his uniform. The officer's face seems to be twisted in a perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he greets you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Master Helmsman Ravor, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der große Mann vor dir scheint nur aus Sehnen und Muskeln zu bestehen. Blaue Venen winden sich unter seiner weißen, beinahe taubengrauen Haut. Die Haare an Kopf und Kinn sind militärisch gestutzt. Die Kabel an Hals und Schultern lassen vermuten, dass sich unter seiner Uniform Neuralkonnektoren verbergen. Obwohl das Gesicht des Offiziers einer Grimasse aus Unmut und Zorn gleicht, grüßt er dich mit einem respektvollen Nicken.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Hauptsteuermann Ravor, stets zu Diensten."

languages.text: {n}L'homme de haute taille qui se tient devant vous semble exclusivement fait de muscles et de tendons. Des veines bleutées courent sous sa peau d'un blanc laiteux, et il porte une barbe aussi courte que ses cheveux ivoirins. Les câbles qui s'enroulent autour de son cou et de ses épaules laissent supposer la présence de connecteurs neuronaux sous son uniforme. Son visage semble perpétuellement figé dans une grimace d'agacement et de colère, mais il vous salue d'un signe de tête respectueux.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine} ! Maître timonier Ravor, pour vous servir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. Blue veins snake under his white, almost dove-coloured skin, and his scalp and chin are covered in cropped white hair. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under his uniform. The officer's face seems to be twisted in a perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he greets you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Master Helmsman Ravor, at your service."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme de haute taille qui se tient devant vous semble exclusivement fait de muscles et de tendons. Des veines bleutées courent sous sa peau d'un blanc laiteux, et il porte une barbe aussi courte que ses cheveux de couleur pâle. Les câbles qui s'enroulent autour de son cou et de ses épaules laissent supposer la présence de connecteurs neuronaux sous son uniforme. Son visage semble perpétuellement figé dans une grimace d'agacement et de colère, mais il vous salue d'un signe de tête respectueux.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine} ! Maître timonier Ravor, pour vous servir. »

languages.text: {n}Karşındaki uzun boylu adam, tendon ve kastan ibaret gibi duruyor. Mavi damarları neredeyse un beyazı teninin altında yılan gibi kıvrılıyor. Ak saçları ve sakalı kısacık kesilmiş. Boynu ve omuzları, üniformasının altındaki sinirsel bağlayıcıların varlığını işaret eden kablolarla sarılı. Subayın suratı sürekli bir kızgınlık ve öfke ifadesiyle buruşmuş gibi görünse de seni saygıyla başını eğerek selamlıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Başserdümen Ravor hizmetinizdedir."
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man before you appears to be woven from tendons and muscle. His neck and shoulders are wrapped in wires that hint at the presence of neural connectors under his uniform. The officer's face seems to be twisted in a perpetual grimace of annoyance and anger, but he greets you with a respectful nod.{/n} "Lord Cap'n! Master Helmsman Ravor, at your service."
